--- title: "Library Call Tracer" layout: default ---
DynamoRIO API
Library Call Tracer

drltrace is a library call tracing tool for all platforms. It is part of the Dr. Memory tool suite. It is also included with DynamoRIO versions 5.0.0 and higher. If this documentation is part of a DynamoRIO public release, this link should point at the local documentation provided with the release package.
